Collection.LongName: CERES-MODIS-CALIPSO-CloudSat CCCM data set is an integrated product in HDF (CER-NEWS_CCCM_Aqua-FM3-MODIS-CAL-CS_RelB1)
Collection.Description: CERES-MODIS-CALIPSO-CloudSat CCCM data set is an integrated product in HDF.

Address.StreetAddress: NASA Langley Research Center Mail Stop 157D

Platform.LongName: Aqua, Latin for water, is a NASA Earth Science satellite mission.* The Aqua spacecraft, carries two CERES instruments (FM-3 and FM-4).*

Sensor.LongName: A broadband scanning radiometer that measures the Earths radiation balance on the Aqua spacecraft.
(CPR) is a 94-GHz nadir-looking radar which measures the power backscattered by clouds as a function of distance from the radar.
A tool for measuring optical thickness of clouds or aerosols and the vertical and horizontal extent of clouds or aerosols.
MODIS is the Moderate Resolution Imaging Spectroradiometer.

Platform.LongName: Cloud-Aerosol Lidar and Infrared Pathfinder Satellite Observations

Sensor.LongName: A broadband scanning radiometer that measures the Earths radiation balance on the Aqua spacecraft.
(CPR) is a 94-GHz nadir-looking radar which measures the power backscattered by clouds as a function of distance from the radar.
A tool for measuring optical thickness of clouds or aerosols and the vertical and horizontal extent of clouds or aerosols.
MODIS is the Moderate Resolution Imaging Spectroradiometer.

Platform.LongName: CLOUDSAT is an experimental satellite that uses radar to observe clouds and precipitation from space.

Sensor.LongName: A broadband scanning radiometer that measures the Earths radiation balance on the Aqua spacecraft.
(CPR) is a 94-GHz nadir-looking radar which measures the power backscattered by clouds as a function of distance from the radar.
A tool for measuring optical thickness of clouds or aerosols and the vertical and horizontal extent of clouds or aerosols.
MODIS is the Moderate Resolution Imaging Spectroradiometer.
